text: Jean-Marie Girault (9 February 1926 - 1 May 2016) was a French politician. He served as mayor of Caen from 1970 through 2001. He was a member of the Union for French Democracy. Girault was born in Pont-l'Évêque, France. Girault died in Caen, France on 1 May 2016, aged 90.Décès de l'ancien sénateur maire de Caen, Jean-Marie Girault in Le Parisien, 1 May 2016 ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2016 deaths Category:French mayors Category:People from Caen Category:Politicians from Normandy
title: Jean-Marie Girault
